description: Example: Simple action reference with target binding. Demonstrates how to reference a primitive action and bind its target placeholder to a task parameter.

steps.description: Pick up the food item. Note: 'item' placeholder name comes from items:pick_up_item action definition.
Consume the food item. Both steps bind to the same task parameter.

_notes: 1. Basic action reference using modId:actionId format
2. Simple target binding from task parameter to action placeholder
- Both actions use 'item' placeholder (must match action definitions)
- No parameter overrides (actions use default parameters)
- If either action fails, entire method fails (fallbackBehavior: 'fail')
